name: Spectral Guardian
flavor: A ghostly fighter with spears and swords, anchored by duty.

features.name: Ghost - Passive
features.desc: The Guardian has resistance to physical damage. Mark a Stress to move up to Close range through solid objects.

features.name: Grave Blade - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to make an attack against a target within Very Close range. On a success, deal 2d10+6 physical damage and the target must mark a Stress.
